modName: A More CHILLED _ Chilledrend _ Crimson Glass Blade HQ retext
summary: This is my first mod on nexus . its a retexture of Chillrend. Its gives a more \"CHILLED\" felling to this already Amzing looking weapon. it took me 3hrs to retexture this so i put a bit in to it . if  u like it much apreciated :D
descriptionHtml:
This is my first mod on nexus . its a retexture of Chillrend. Its gives a more \"CHILLED\" felling to this already Amzing looking weapon with Better Glow Effects Really adds To the CHILL feel :D. it took me 3hrs to retexture this so i put a bit in to it . if  u like it much apreciated :D 

Cheers GameNInjaPro :D

COMING SOON

Lightningrend with White glow and White lightning effects

UPDATE  2 FILE WITH CRIMSON RED GLAS BLADE WITH GLOW EFFECTS !!
author: GameNinjaPro
